text: Fahrudin Šolbić (born 23 October 1958) is a Bosnian professional football manager. He was most recently manager of Bosnian Premier League club Mladost Doboj Kakanj, firstly as caretaker manager and then as permanent manager. title: Fahrudin Šolbić
